name: app.R
content:
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(shinythemes)
library(shinylive)

ui <- fluidPage(
  
  theme = shinytheme("flatly"),
  
  titlePanel("Organizational Assessment"),
  
  
  
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(style = "height: 90vh; overflow-y: auto;",
                 radioButtons(
                   inputId = "classic_1", 
                   label = "Division of labor is emphasized within the organization.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_2", 
                   label = "The organization follows a strict hierarchical structure.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "authoritarian_1", 
                   label = "Leaders within the organization prescribe solutions and activities without input from those not supervising them.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_3", 
                   label = "Communication primarily flows from the top down. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_4", 
                   label = "Time management is rigorously enforced. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "authoritarian_2", 
                   label = "Leaders within the organization closely supervise the work of employees.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_5", 
                   label = "Uniformity and formalization are highly valued. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_6", 
                   label = "Employees have highly specialized roles. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "authoritarian_3", 
                   label = "Leaders actively pair reward and punishment with good and poor performance.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_7", 
                   label = "The organization operates based on clearly defined rules. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_8", 
                   label = "Employees' personal and emotional lives are kept separate from their work. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "authoritarian_4", 
                   label = "Leaders promote and highly value efficiency and good time management.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_9", 
                   label = "Motivation is driven by the threat of punishment or the promise of reward. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "classic_10", 
                   label = "Efficiency and productivity are prioritized above all else. 
", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "authoritarian_5", 
                   label = "Leaders are responsible for both successes and failures of their group members.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_1", 
                   label = "Shared values and beliefs are clearly communicated among members. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_2", 
                   label = "The organization has distinct rituals or traditions that are regularly practiced. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "democratic_1", 
                   label = "Leaders allow their group members to be involved and have a voice when decisions will affect them.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_3", 
                   label = "There are recognized heroes or heroines who embody the organization's values. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_4", 
                   label = "Employees look to their leaders as role models.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "democratic_2", 
                   label = "Leaders actively seek and apply ideas from their group members.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_5", 
                   label = "Employees frequently communicate with one another.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_6", 
                   label = "Relationships among employees and their leaders are positive and constructive.",
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                     
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "democratic_3", 
                   label = "Leaders value consensus of the group when decisions are made.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_7", 
                   label = "The organization's purpose or reason for existing is clear to its members.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
             
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_8", 
                   label = "Unwritten rules or social norms guide behavior. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                          
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "democratic_4", 
                   label = "Leaders promote growth through collaboration.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_9", 
                   label = "The internal emotional tone of the organization is supportive. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
        
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "culture_10", 
                   label = "Widely known phrases ore stories are often referenced in trainings and among employees.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "democratic_5", 
                   label = "Leaders build commitment through opportunities for participation.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_1", 
                   label = "Strengths and weaknesses are constantly assessed to avoid stagnation.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_2", 
                   label = "Stability is maintained through various systems and methods.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "laissez_1", 
                   label = "Leaders provide a clear vision but allow the attaining of it to the discretion of their group members.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_3", 
                   label = "Backup plans and capabilities are in place to compensate for loss and change. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_4", 
                   label = "Different parts of the organization depend on one another. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "laissez_2", 
                   label = "Leaders provide tools, resources, and support without interfering with group members’ decision making process.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_5", 
                   label = "The organization is prepared with a variety of solutions to potential problems. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_6", 
                   label = "The organization changes when new needs are recognized in its environemt.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "laissez_3", 
                   label = "Leaders encourage and watch for the attainment of leadership skills and attributes.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_7", 
                   label = "The organizaiton is willing to abandon tradition to test new potentially effective methods.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_8", 
                   label = "Employees are cross-trained in multiple positions or roles. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "laissez_4", 
                   label = "Leaders express trust in the individual and collective efforts of group members.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_9", 
                   label = "The organization views itself as more than the sum of its parts.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "system_10", 
                   label = "The organization effectively utilizes feedback to improve its approach.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "laissez_5", 
                   label = "Leaders encourage innovation, creativity, and initiative among employees.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_1", 
                   label = "Employees feel valued and recognized as individuals.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_2", 
                   label = "Interpersonal and group relationships are seen as important for productivity. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "situational_1", 
                   label = "Leaders change their approach and style in different situations.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_3", 
                   label = "Leaders encourage subordinates’ autonomy and responsibility. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_4", 
                   label = "Information flow from lower to upper levels is supported. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "situational_2", 
                   label = "If efforts and approaches shift, leaders provide rationale for the change.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_5", 
                   label = "Employees are encouraged to make their own decisions", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_6", 
                   label = "Leaders assume that people are willing to work towards organizational goals. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "situational_3", 
                   label = "Leaders vary their style in order to get the most out of varying situations. (e.g., Authoritarian, Democratic, Laissez-Faire)?", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_7", 
                   label = "Leaders assume that people are intelligent and creative. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_8", 
                   label = "The organization taps into the full potential of its employees. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                            
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "situational_4", 
                   label = "Time constraints, needed quality of work, and growth personal growth opportunities are taken into account when leaders shift their style and approach.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_9", 
                   label = "A supportive climate where employees feel valued is fostered. ", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
      
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "human_10", 
                   label = "Employees are involved in setting goals and standards they are held to.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) , selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 radioButtons( 
                   inputId = "situational_5", 
                   label = "Leaders are perceived as consistent and stable, even when shifting their style and approach.", 
                   choices = list(
                     "Never" = 0,
                     "Rarely" = 1, 
                     "Sometimes" = 2, 
                     "Often" = 3,
                     "Always" = 4
                   ) ,  selected = 2
                 ),
                 
                 
                 
                 actionButton("submit", "Get Results", icon = icon("refresh"))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      tabsetPanel(
        tabPanel(
        title = "Theory Results",
      plotOutput("theory_g"),  # Main plot output in the center
      
      # Right sidebar for conditional text
      htmlOutput("largest_sum"),
      htmlOutput("smallest_sum")
      
      ),
        tabPanel(
          title = "Leadership Results",
          
          plotOutput("leader_g"),
          
          htmlOutput("best_leader"),
          
          htmlOutput("worst_leader")
          
        ),
        tabPanel(
          title = "Communication Results",
          
          plotOutput("comm_g"),
          
          htmlOutput("best_comm"),
          
          htmlOutput("worst_comm")
          
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  
  # Define responses as reactiveValues
  responses <- reactiveValues(
    classic_1 = NULL, system_1 = NULL, human_1 = NULL, culture_1 = NULL,
    classic_2 = NULL, system_2 = NULL, human_2 = NULL, culture_2 = NULL,
    classic_3 = NULL, system_3 = NULL, human_3 = NULL, culture_3 = NULL,
    classic_4 = NULL, system_4 = NULL, human_4 = NULL, culture_4 = NULL,
    classic_5 = NULL, system_5 = NULL, human_5 = NULL, culture_5 = NULL,
    classic_6 = NULL, system_6 = NULL, human_6 = NULL, culture_6 = NULL,
    classic_7 = NULL, system_7 = NULL, human_7 = NULL, culture_7 = NULL,
    classic_8 = NULL, system_8 = NULL, human_8 = NULL, culture_8 = NULL,
    classic_9 = NULL, system_9 = NULL, human_9 = NULL, culture_9 = NULL,
    classic_10 = NULL, system_10 = NULL, human_10 = NULL, culture_10 = NULL,
    authoritarian_1 = NULL, democratic_1 = NULL, laissez_1 = NULL, situational_1 = NULL,
    authoritarian_2 = NULL, democratic_2 = NULL, laissez_2 = NULL, situational_2 = NULL,
    authoritarian_3 = NULL, democratic_3 = NULL, laissez_3 = NULL, situational_3 = NULL,
    authoritarian_4 = NULL, democratic_4 = NULL, laissez_4 = NULL, situational_4 = NULL,
    authoritarian_5 = NULL, democratic_5 = NULL, laissez_5 = NULL, situational_5 = NULL
  )
  
  observeEvent(input$submit, {
    responses$classic_1 <- input$classic_1
    responses$classic_2 <- input$classic_2
    responses$classic_3 <- input$classic_3
    responses$classic_4 <- input$classic_4
    responses$classic_5 <- input$classic_5
    responses$classic_6 <- input$classic_6
    responses$classic_7 <- input$classic_7
    responses$classic_8 <- input$classic_8
    responses$classic_9 <- input$classic_9
    responses$classic_10 <- input$classic_10
    responses$system_1 <- input$system_1
    responses$system_2 <- input$system_2
    responses$system_3 <- input$system_3
    responses$system_4 <- input$system_4
    responses$system_5 <- input$system_5
    responses$system_6 <- input$system_6
    responses$system_7 <- input$system_7
    responses$system_8 <- input$system_8
    responses$system_9 <- input$system_9
    responses$system_10 <- input$system_10
    responses$human_1 <- input$human_1
    responses$human_2 <- input$human_2
    responses$human_3 <- input$human_3
    responses$human_4 <- input$human_4
    responses$human_5 <- input$human_5
    responses$human_6 <- input$human_6
    responses$human_7 <- input$human_7
    responses$human_8 <- input$human_8
    responses$human_9 <- input$human_9
    responses$human_10 <- input$human_10
    responses$culture_1 <- input$culture_1
    responses$culture_2 <- input$culture_2
    responses$culture_3 <- input$culture_3
    responses$culture_4 <- input$culture_4
    responses$culture_5 <- input$culture_5
    responses$culture_6 <- input$culture_6
    responses$culture_7 <- input$culture_7
    responses$culture_8 <- input$culture_8
    responses$culture_9 <- input$culture_9
    responses$culture_10 <- input$culture_10
    responses$authoritarian_1 <- input$authoritarian_1
    responses$authoritarian_2 <- input$authoritarian_2
    responses$authoritarian_3 <- input$authoritarian_3
    responses$authoritarian_4 <- input$authoritarian_4
    responses$authoritarian_5 <- input$authoritarian_5
    responses$democratic_1 <- input$democratic_1
    responses$democratic_2 <- input$democratic_2
    responses$democratic_3 <- input$democratic_3
    responses$democratic_4 <- input$democratic_4
    responses$democratic_5 <- input$democratic_5
    responses$laissez_1 <- input$laissez_1
    responses$laissez_2 <- input$laissez_2
    responses$laissez_3 <- input$laissez_3
    responses$laissez_4 <- input$laissez_4
    responses$laissez_5 <- input$laissez_5
    responses$situational_1 <- input$situational_1
    responses$situational_2 <- input$situational_2
    responses$situational_3 <- input$situational_3
    responses$situational_4 <- input$situational_4
    responses$situational_5 <- input$situational_5
    
    # Convert reactiveValues to a list
    responses_list <- reactiveValuesToList(responses)
    
    
    
    
    
    
    # Create vectors for questions and types
    org_q_vec <- c(
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_1), as.numeric(responses_list$system_1), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_1), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_1), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_2), as.numeric(responses_list$system_2), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_2), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_2), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_3), as.numeric(responses_list$system_3), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_3), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_3), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_4), as.numeric(responses_list$system_4), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_4), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_4), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_5), as.numeric(responses_list$system_5), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_5), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_5), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_6), as.numeric(responses_list$system_6), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_6), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_6), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_7), as.numeric(responses_list$system_7), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_7), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_7), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_8), as.numeric(responses_list$system_8), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_8), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_8), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_9), as.numeric(responses_list$system_9), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_9), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_9), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$classic_10), as.numeric(responses_list$system_10), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$human_10), as.numeric(responses_list$culture_10)
    )
    
    org_type_vec <- rep(c("Classic Theory", "Systems Theory", "Human Theory", "Culture Theory"), times = 10)
    
    # Create the dataframe
    df_org <- data.frame(
      questions = org_q_vec,
      type = org_type_vec
    )
    
    # Calculate the sum for each category
    sums <- df_org %>%
      group_by(type) %>%
      summarize(sum_value = sum(questions, na.rm = TRUE))
    
    # Find the category with the largest sum
    max_sum <- sums %>%
      filter(sum_value == max(sum_value)) %>%
      select(type, sum_value) %>%
      slice(1)
    
    # Find the category with the smallest sum
    min_sum <- sums %>%
      filter(sum_value == min(sum_value)) %>%
      select(type, sum_value) %>%
      slice(1)
    
    
    

    output$largest_sum <- renderUI({
      HTML(paste0(
        "<h4>Group with Largest Sum:</h4>",
        "<p><strong>", max_sum$type, "</strong> with a sum value of ", round(max_sum$sum_value, 2), ".</p>"
      ))
    })
    
    # Output the group with the smallest sum
    output$smallest_sum <- renderUI({
      HTML(paste0(
        "<h4>Group with Smallest Sum:</h4>",
        "<p><strong>", min_sum$type, "</strong> with a sum value of ", round(min_sum$sum_value, 2), ".</p>"
      ))
    })
    
    
    #    output$largest_sum <- if (max_sum$type == "System Theory"){
    
    #    }
    #    else if (max_sum$type == "Culture Theory"){
    
    #    }
    #   else if (max_sum$type == "Human Theory"){
    
    #    }
    #   else{
    
    #    }
    # Output the group with the largest sum
    # 
    #     #    output$smallest_sum <- if (max_sum$type == "System Theory"){
    
    #    }
    #    else if (max_sum$type == "Culture Theory"){
    
    #    }
    #   else if (max_sum$type == "Human Theory"){
    
    #    }
    #   else{
    
    #    }


    
     
    # Plot using ggplot2
    output$theory_g <- renderPlot({
      ggplot(data = df_org, aes(x = type, fill = type, y = questions)) +
        geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
        coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 50)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = c( "#95A5A6","#18BC9C", "#7B8A8B" ,"#2C3E50"))+
        theme_bw() +
        theme(axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
              axis.text.y = element_blank(),
              legend.position = "none")
    })
    

    
    leader_q_vec <- c(
      as.numeric(responses_list$authoritarian_1), as.numeric(responses_list$democratic_1), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$laissez_1), as.numeric(responses_list$situational_1), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$authoritarian_2), as.numeric(responses_list$democratic_2), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$laissez_2), as.numeric(responses_list$situational_2), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$authoritarian_3), as.numeric(responses_list$democratic_3), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$laissez_3), as.numeric(responses_list$situational_3), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$authoritarian_4), as.numeric(responses_list$democratic_4), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$laissez_4), as.numeric(responses_list$situational_4), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$authoritarian_5), as.numeric(responses_list$democratic_5), 
      as.numeric(responses_list$laissez_5), as.numeric(responses_list$situational_5)
    )
   leader_type_vec <- rep(c("Authoritarian Leadership", "Democratic Leadership", "Laissez-Faire Leadership", "Situational Leadership"), times = 5)
    
    # Create the dataframe
    df_leader <- data.frame(
      questions = leader_q_vec,
      type = leader_type_vec
    )
    

    leader_sums <- df_leader %>%
      group_by(type) %>%
      summarize(sum_value = sum(questions, na.rm = TRUE))
    
    # Find the category with the largest sum
    best_leader <- leader_sums %>%
      filter(sum_value == max(sum_value)) %>%
      select(type, sum_value) %>%
      slice(1)
    
    # Find the category with the smallest sum
    worst_leader <- leader_sums %>%
      filter(sum_value == min(sum_value)) %>%
      select(type, sum_value) %>%
      slice(1)
    
    
    
    
    output$best_leader<- renderUI({
      HTML(paste0(
        "<h4>Group with Largest Sum:</h4>",
        "<p><strong>", best_leader$type, "</strong> with a sum value of ", round(best_leader$sum_value, 2), ".</p>"
      ))
    })
    
    # Output the group with the smallest sum
    output$worst_leader <- renderUI({
      HTML(paste0(
        "<h4>Group with Smallest Sum:</h4>",
        "<p><strong>", worst_leader$type, "</strong> with a sum value of ", round(worst_leader$sum_value, 2), ".</p>"
      ))
    })
    
      output$leader_g <- renderPlot({
        ggplot(data = df_leader, aes(x = type, fill = type, y = questions)) +
          geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
          coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 25)) +
          scale_fill_manual(values = c( "#95A5A6","#18BC9C", "#7B8A8B" ,"#2C3E50"))+
          theme_bw()+
          theme(axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
                axis.text.y = element_blank(),
                legend.position = "none")
        
        
        
        #    output$best_leader <- if (best_leader$type == "System Theory"){
        
        #    }
        #    else if (best_leader$type == "Culture Theory"){
        
        #    }
        #   else if (best_leader$type == "Human Theory"){
        
        #    }
        #   else{
        
        #    }

        # 
        #     #    output$worst_leader <- if (worst_leader$type == "System Theory"){
        
        #    }
        #    else if (worst_leader$type == "Culture Theory"){
        
        #    }
        #   else if (worst_leader$type == "Human Theory"){
        
        #    }
        #   else{
        
        #    }
        
          
      })
      
       }) 
      
      
}





shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
